modName: Disable slow motion for killmoves and forced killcam
summary: No slow motion killmoves. If your playing in third person, your killmove will be in third person. If your in first person, your killmove will be in first person.
descriptionHtml:
I came across this a while ago and thought I should share it with the community. Adding this simple line to the Skyrim.ini will disable slow motion killmoves and forced perspective. If you\'re playing in third person, your killmove will be in real time third person. If you\'re in first person, your killmove will be in real time first person.

The Skyrim.ini is located in your documents/mygames/skyrim

Add:

[VATS]
bVATSDisable=1


[center][url=http://SkyrimGEMS.com][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge_animated.gif[/img][/url]
[size=4][b](Category: 340 - Combat)[/b][/size][/center]
author: Drazhar14
